channel.title: Navel Gazing on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Navel Gazing on My New Hugo Site

item.title: We're Literally Navel-Gazing
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: It’s the one thing that separates humans from androids. Like the appendix, it’s functionally useless—minus the period before you’re actually born, when it’s pretty much the most important part of your body. Unlike the appendix, it’s visible and easy to spot. It, of course, is the belly button—one of the most-common but least-discussed parts of the human body. (Well, unless you’re Taylor Swift.) Innie or outie?
